"Lize": "I am Lize, attendant to Nadereh."
"Although, I'm really more of a bodyguard."
"Mura's the one in charge of administrative matters. If you have any questions, please ask her."
"I heard you've dealt with the DOLLS in the canyon."
"To defeat that many... That is quite significant."
"Nadereh has recognized your accomplishments. I pray for your future endeavors."
"This attack was on a scale we've never seen before. We've sustained many casualties."
"Even Nadereh is feeling pressured..."
"But she is our leader. She'll find a way through this for us."
"Retem City has settled down at last."
"Many of us have even taken up music again. I took a look through the musical instrument storehouse..."
"But many of them are in disrepair... They have not had the proper maintenance in some time."
"They'll need materials in order to repair them. Could you help gather those materials?"
"Alpha Reactors are a type of power source..."
"And with a bit of processing, they can be fitted for use with instruments."
"It may take some time, but I leave this to you."
"I have heard Stellar Seeds are rocks that fall during meteor showers..."
"With some simple adjustments, they can be made to work with instruments."
"Please do not worry. Don't force yourself."
"Let me see. Hm... they're in good condition."
"These should work fine for the repairs. Thank you, you were a great help."
"Still, it's been a while since I performed. I hope my skills haven't deteriorated..."
"I'll need to practice hard, to support Nadereh's singing properly."
"Thanks to you, I should be able to repair everything."
"Still, it's been a while since I performed. I hope my skills haven't deteriorated..."
"I'll need to practice hard, to support Nadereh's singing properly."
"You're back. Have you found the Stellar Seeds?"
"Hand over the 5 Stellar Seeds"
"Return"
"Let me see. Hm... they're in good condition."
"These should work fine for the repairs. Thank you, you were a great help."
"Still, it's been a while since I performed. I hope my skills haven't deteriorated..."
"I'll need to practice hard, to support Nadereh's singing properly."
"You haven't gathered enough... Please come back once you've found a few more."
"I see... Perhaps another time."
